Context: Menu for adding and customizing map markers. Used to mark places of interests on the map
This appears as a separate UI element in front of the controller button image in GamepadHints: `(Hold) Ⓐ` if the need to be held to trigger the action

This is used to create each line of a keybinding hint, displayed next to a controller button on the controller mappings screen, any leading or trailing whitespace is trimmed
E.g., it could be used to create two lines like this (where [X] is an image of a controller button):
[X] Jump
Hold: [X] Fly
VariableDescription:
{Variant} = `UI/ControllerMappings/HoldPrefixColon` or `UI/ControllerMappings/LongPressPrefixColon` or empty string
{Display Name} = Name of the action (e.g., Build Menu, Jump, Quick Search, etc)
